original_text: When the sun had gone down and it was dark, behold, a smoking fire pot and a flaming torch passed between these pieces.
korean_text: 해가 져서 어두울 때에 연기 나는 화로가 보이며 타는 횃불이 쪼갠 고기 사이로 지나더라

sentences.original_text: When the sun had gone down and it was dark,
a smoking fire pot and a flaming torch passed between these pieces.
sentences.korean_translation: 연기 나는 화로와 타는 횃불이 이것들 사이로 지나갔다.
